verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went רְחַבְעָ֖ם <S%H7346><s%> And Rehoboam שְׁכֶ֑מָה <S%H7927><s%> to Shechem כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for שְׁכֶ֛ם <S%H7927><s%> for to Shechem בָּ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> come כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> were all Israel לְהַמְלִ֥יךְ <S%H4427><s%> to make him king אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> become כִּשְׁמֹ֨עַ <S%H8085><s%> heard יָרָבְעָ֤ם <S%H3379><s%> And it came to pass when Jeroboam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְבָט֙ <S%H5028><s%> of Nebat וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בְמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> who [was] in Egypt אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> where בָּרַ֔ח <S%H1272><s%> whither he had fled מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> from the presence שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וַיָּ֥שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> returned יָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> [it] that Jeroboam מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt

וַֽיִּשְׁלְחוּ֙ <S%H7971><s%> And they sent וַיִּקְרְאוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> and called ל֔וֹ וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> came יָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> him So Jeroboam וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel וַֽיְדַבְּר֔וּ <S%H1696><s%> and spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רְחַבְעָ֖ם <S%H7346><s%> to Rehoboam לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> Thy father הִקְשָׁ֣ה <S%H7185><s%> grievous אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֻלֵּ֑נוּ <S%H5923><s%> made our yoke וְעַתָּ֡ה <S%H6258><s%> now הָקֵל֩ <S%H7043><s%> now therefore ease מֵעֲבֹדַ֨ת <S%H5656><s%> servitude אָבִ֜יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father הַקָּשָׁ֗ה <S%H7186><s%> thou somewhat the grievous וּמֵעֻלּ֧וֹ <S%H5923><s%> yoke הַכָּבֵ֛ד <S%H3515><s%> and his heavy אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> that he put עָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> on וְנַֽעַבְדֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H5647><s%> upon us and we will serve

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to me ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> unto me after three יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> days וְשׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> unto them Come again אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> about וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> departed הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> And the people ס

וַיִּוָּעַ֞ץ <S%H3289><s%> took counsel הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And king רְחַבְעָ֗ם <S%H7346><s%> Rehoboam אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הַזְּקֵנִים֙ <S%H2205><s%> with the old אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> had עֹֽמְדִ֗ים <S%H5975><s%> men that had stood לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> his father בִּֽהְיֹת֥וֹ <S%H1961><s%> had חַ֖י <S%H2416><s%> while he yet lived לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אֵ֚יךְ <S%H349><s%> What אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you נֽוֹעָצִ֔ים <S%H3289><s%> counsel give לְהָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> ye [me] to return לָֽעָם־ <S%H5971><s%> folk הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> answer

וַיְדַבְּר֨וּ <S%H1696><s%> And they spake אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> to him לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> unto him saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תִּֽהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְט֜וֹב <S%H2896><s%> If thou be kind לְהָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> to this people הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> to this וּרְצִיתָ֔ם <S%H7521><s%> and please וְדִבַּרְתָּ֥ <S%H1696><s%> them and speak אֲלֵהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> about דְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> words טוֹבִ֑ים <S%H2896><s%> good וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לְךָ֛ עֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> to them they will be thy servants כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> for ever

וַֽיַּעֲזֹ֛ב <S%H5800><s%> But he forsook אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲצַ֥ת <S%H6098><s%> the counsel הַזְּקֵנִ֖ים <S%H2205><s%> which the old men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יְעָצֻ֑הוּ <S%H3289><s%> gave וַיִּוָּעַ֗ץ <S%H3289><s%> him and took counsel אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הַיְלָדִים֙ <S%H3206><s%> with the young men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who גָּדְל֣וּ <S%H1431><s%> that were brought up אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> that הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <S%H5975><s%> with him that stood לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to מָ֚ה <S%H4100><s%> What אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you נֽוֹעָצִ֔ים <S%H3289><s%> unto them What advice וְנָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> give ye that we may return דָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> answer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> to this people הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who דִּבְּר֤וּ <S%H1696><s%> which have spoken אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> to me saying הָקֵל֙ <S%H7043><s%> Ease מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָעֹ֔ל <S%H5923><s%> somewhat the yoke אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> did put אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> that thy father עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> him

וַיְדַבְּר֣וּ <S%H1696><s%> with him spake אִתּ֗וֹ <S%H854><s%> for הַיְלָדִים֙ <S%H3206><s%> And the young men אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who גָּדְל֣וּ <S%H1431><s%> that were brought up אִתּוֹ֮ <S%H854><s%> to him לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> unto him saying כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus תֹאמַ֡ר <S%H559><s%> Thus shalt thou answer לָעָם֩ <S%H5971><s%> the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who דִּבְּר֨וּ <S%H1696><s%> that spake אֵלֶ֜יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> unto thee saying אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> Thy father הִכְבִּ֣יד <S%H3513><s%> heavy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֻלֵּ֔נוּ <S%H5923><s%> our yoke וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you הָקֵ֣ל <S%H7043><s%> but make thou [it] somewhat lighter מֵעָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus תֹּאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> for us thus shalt thou say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to קָֽטָנִּ֥י <S%H6995><s%> unto them My little עָבָ֖ה <S%H5666><s%> [finger] shall be thicker מִמָּתְנֵ֥י <S%H4975><s%> loins אָבִֽי׃ <S%H1><s%> than my father's

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> For whereas אָבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> my father הֶעְמִ֤יס <S%H6006><s%> put עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> and עֹ֣ל <S%H5923><s%> yoke כָּבֵ֔ד <S%H3515><s%> a heavy וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I אֹסִ֣יף <S%H3254><s%> upon you I will put more עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto עֻלְּכֶ֑ם <S%H5923><s%> to your yoke אָבִ֗י <S%H1><s%> my father יִסַּ֤ר <S%H3256><s%> chastised אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> בַּשּׁוֹטִ֔ים <S%H7752><s%> you with whips וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I בָּֽעֲקְרַבִּֽים׃ <S%H6137><s%> but I [will chastise you] with scorpions ס

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> came יָרָבְעָ֧ם <S%H3379><s%> So Jeroboam וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רְחַבְעָ֖ם <S%H7346><s%> to Rehoboam בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֑י <S%H7992><s%> on the third כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> bade הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> as the king לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying שׁ֥וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Come again אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִשִֽׁי׃ <S%H7992><s%> to me on the third

וַיַּעֲנֵ֥ם <S%H6030><s%> answered הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king קָשָׁ֑ה <S%H7186><s%> them roughly וַֽיַּעֲזֹב֙ <S%H5800><s%> forsook הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and king רְחַבְעָ֔ם <S%H7346><s%> Rehoboam אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> עֲצַ֥ת <S%H6098><s%> the counsel הַזְּקֵנִֽים׃ <S%H2205><s%> of the old men

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> And answered אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to כַּעֲצַ֤ת <S%H6098><s%> them after the advice הַיְלָדִים֙ <S%H3206><s%> of the young men לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying אַכְבִּיד֙ <S%H3513><s%> heavy אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> עֻלְּכֶ֔ם <S%H5923><s%> made your yoke וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I אֹסִ֣יף <S%H3254><s%> but I will add עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> and אָבִ֗י <S%H1><s%> My father יִסַּ֤ר <S%H3256><s%> chastised אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> בַּשּׁוֹטִ֔ים <S%H7752><s%> you with whips וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I בָּעֲקְרַבִּֽים׃ <S%H6137><s%> but I [will chastise you] with scorpions

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> hearkened הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> So the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> not unto the people כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> it was נְסִבָּה֙ <S%H5252><s%> for the cause מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> from הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> was of God לְמַעַן֩ <S%H4616><s%> might הָקִ֨ים <S%H6965><s%> might perform יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָר֗וֹ <S%H1697><s%> his word אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> which he spake בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand אֲחִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H281><s%> of Ahijah הַשִּֽׁלוֹנִ֔י <S%H7888><s%> the Shilonite אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> to Jeroboam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְבָֽט׃ <S%H5028><s%> of Nebat

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> And when all Israel כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> would not hearken הַמֶּלֶךְ֮ <S%H4428><s%> ] that the king לָהֶם֒ <S%H1992><s%> like וַיָּשִׁ֣יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> answered הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> unto them the people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ ׀ <S%H4428><s%> the king לֵאמֹ֡ר <S%H559><s%> saying מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What לָּנוּ֩ חֵ֨לֶק <S%H2506><s%> What portion בְּדָוִ֜יד <S%H1732><s%> [and] now David וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נַחֲלָ֣ה <S%H5159><s%> inheritance בְּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> in the son יִשַׁ֗י <S%H3448><s%> of Jesse אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְאֹהָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H168><s%> to your tents יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel עַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> Now רְאֵ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> [saw בֵיתְךָ֖ <S%H1004><s%> to thine own house דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> David וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> departed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> So all Israel לְאֹהָלָֽיו׃ <S%H168><s%> to their tents ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> But [as for] the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַיֹּֽשְׁבִ֖ים <S%H3427><s%> that dwelt בְּעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> in the cities יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיִּמְלֹ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> over רְחַבְעָֽם׃ <S%H7346><s%> Rehoboam

וַיִּשְׁלַ֞ח <S%H7971><s%> sent הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then king רְחַבְעָ֗ם <S%H7346><s%> Rehoboam אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֲדֹרָם֙ <S%H1913><s%> Hadoram אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> was over הַמַּ֔ס <S%H4522><s%> that [was] over the tribute וַיִּרְגְּמוּ־ <S%H7275><s%> stoned ב֧וֹ בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶ֖בֶן <S%H68><s%> him with stones וַיָּמֹ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> that he died וְהַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> But king רְחַבְעָ֗ם <S%H7346><s%> Rehoboam הִתְאַמֵּץ֙ <S%H553><s%> made speed לַֽעֲל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> to get him up בַּמֶּרְכָּבָ֔ה <S%H4818><s%> to [his] chariot לָנ֖וּס <S%H5127><s%> to flee יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem ס

וַיִּפְשְׁע֤וּ <S%H6586><s%> rebelled יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> And Israel בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> against the house דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> of David עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this ס
